pkgmetadata.longdescription: # magic-importImport python object from string and return the reference of the object. The object can be a class, instance, variable and anything else, and can be from class, instance, module, global/local environment.## Install```pip install magic-import```## Test Passed On Python Versions- 2.7- 3.2- 3.3- 3.4- 3.5- 3.6- 3.7- 3.8- 3.9- 3.10- 3.11## Usage```from magic_import import import_from_stringlistdir = import_from_string("os.listdir")files = listdir(".")```## Release### 0.1.0- First release### 0.1.1### 0.1.2### 0.1.3### 0.2.0- Some updates.### 0.2.2- Test passed on all python versions.
